quick_risk_captures.project_name: Kontra Bantuan Penyediaan Jasa Tenaga Ahli GKAO

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kebocoran data operasional dan informasi sensitif proyek akibat cyberattack
risks.sumberRisiko: Sistem keamanan siber yang belum optimal dan awareness tim yang masih rendah
risks.dampakKualitatif: Kehilangan kepercayaan klien, reputasi perusahaan menurun, potential legal liability dari regulator
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Estimasi kerugian finansial hingga Rp 5 miliar untuk compensation dan legal fees
risks.kontrolEksisting: Multi-factor authentication, regular security audit, VPN access untuk remote work

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Tenaga ahli GKAO key person meninggalkan proyek di tengah masa kontrak
risks.sumberRisiko: Kurangnya employee retention program dan tawaran kompensasi yang lebih baik dari competitor
risks.dampakKualitatif: Delay project deliverable, knowledge gap, penurunan kualitas output operasional
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Delay 2-4 bulan dengan cost impact Rp 1.2 miliar untuk recruitment dan training replacement
risks.kontrolEksisting: Retention bonus program, clear career path, competitive compensation package

quick_risk_captures.project_name: Pelaksanaan Assessment NOT Berdasarkan Hasil Study

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Assessment tidak memenuhi standar regulatory compliance yang ditetapkan
risks.sumberRisiko: Perubahan regulasi yang frequent dan complexity dalam interpretasi requirement assessment
risks.dampakKualitatif: Sanksi regulatori, potential repeat assessment, reputational damage terhadap kredibilitas
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Regulatory fine hingga Rp 15 miliar, cost untuk re-assessment Rp 3 miliar
risks.kontrolEksisting: Regular compliance review, legal consultation, dedicated assessment quality team

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Timeline assessment terlambat akibat koordinasi yang tidak optimal antar stakeholder
risks.sumberRisiko: Jadwal yang tight, dependency pada multiple parties, communication gap
risks.dampakKualitatif: Delay project completion, client dissatisfaction, impact pada credibility untuk future projects
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Penalty delay hingga Rp 500 juta, opportunity cost dari late delivery
risks.kontrolEksisting: Project management tools, regular stakeholder meeting, clear communication protocol

quick_risk_captures.project_name: Kontrak Bantuan Penyediaan Tenaga Ahli Regulasi dan Non-Regulasi

risks.taksonomi: Teknologi & Keamanan Siber - Infrastruktur dan Sistem
risks.peristiwaRisiko: Payroll system integration failure dengan existing HR system
risks.sumberRisiko: Incompatibility sistem lama dengan sistem baru, lack of proper system integration testing
risks.dampakKualitatif: Disruption pada payroll processing, employee dissatisfaction, administrative burden
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Cost untuk system recovery Rp 800 juta, manual process overhead Rp 200 juta per bulan
risks.kontrolEksisting: Comprehensive system testing, backup payment process, dedicated IT support team

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Ketidaksesuaian kebijakan kompensasi antara tenaga ahli regulasi dan non-regulasi
risks.sumberRisiko: Lack of standardized compensation policy, different skill level requirements
risks.dampakKualitatif: Employee conflict, unfair treatment perception, potential legal dispute
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Legal settlement cost hingga Rp 1 miliar, turnover cost Rp 500 juta
risks.kontrolEksisting: Clear compensation framework, transparent grading system, HR policy documentation

quick_risk_captures.project_name: Kontrak Bantuan Penyediaan Jasa Tenaga Ahli Operasi dan Maintenance

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kecelakaan kerja saat operasi maintenance fasilitas surface production
risks.sumberRisiko: High-risk working environment, equipment failure risk, human error potential
risks.dampakKualitatif: Worker injury, operational downtime, regulatory scrutiny dari Kemnaker
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Medical cost dan compensation hingga Rp 2 miliar, production loss Rp 5 miliar per hari
risks.kontrolEksisting: Comprehensive safety training, proper PPE, regular equipment maintenance, safety officer supervision

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Fluktuasi nilai tukar rupiah mempengaruhi cost struktur project yang menggunakan equipment import
risks.sumberRisiko: Global economic uncertainty, inflation pressure, currency volatility
risks.dampakKualitatif: Budget overrun, margin compression, potential renegotiation dengan client
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Additional cost hingga Rp 800 juta untuk currency impact, hedging cost Rp 100 juta
risks.kontrolEksisting: Currency hedging strategy, regular budget monitoring, price escalation clause in contract
